publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-8190 Pauline McNeill: Welcome to the MOBO Awards—That the Parliament congratulates Glasgow on securing a three-year deal to host the MOBO awards; considers that this is a testament to the massive success of the awards in 2009; acknowledges the vibrant music scene in Glasgow and that this has secured Glasgow’s position as UNESCO City of Music; looks forward to welcoming the awards to the new National Arena in the Scottish Exhibition and Conference Centre (SECC), and further celebrates that the 2015 awards will mark the 20th anniversary of the MOBO organisation.
S3M-8190 Welcome to the MOBO Awards (lodged on 16 March 2011) Jamie Hepburn*
